messages.subject: (For Robin)  Re: Please help re. bullying (sorry - long), Part 3
messages.msgSnippet: ... That s right.  I m printing out everyone s post to show to DH. I can t see any reason to leave him in school. In spite of health ... [Non-text portions
messages.messageBody:
>> He won't learn to be less sensitive by being bullied.

That's right. I'm printing out everyone's post to show to DH.>> I can't see any reason to leave him in school. In spite of health
>> issues you might have, would he not be happier at home?Yes, he would! (My heart is breaking...)

>> Time to look at your son, not bend to pressure from school officials,
>> other parents or anyone else. Your son needs to trust you to help him
>> be happy.That's why I think unschooling is so good. Thanks for all the wonderful reminders,and thanks for taking the time to read through my posts -- I really appreciate it!Shelley



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
